ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Box, & FREE 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
12 Cameras: 1/3" SONY EXview HAD CCD II Camera, Effio-E. 700 TV lines, 6~22mm varifocal lens, 72pcs IR LED, 196 ft IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Vandal proof & water proof
16 Channel DVR with 4TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time Recording+Playback, Support CDRW/DVD-RW, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs, 2 USB ports for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Enterprice CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 16 Channel DVR 4TB HDD 960H & D1 Real-Time Recording+Playback Support CDRW/DVD-RW, 12 SONY Effio-E Cameras 700TVL VariFocal Lens 72Pcs IR LED, iPhone Android Viewable
